changeSet.author: mdaly
changeSet.comment: Associate the positive FANCC templates with the positive FANCC supplement. Template IDs (144, 145, 146, 147, 148) are in ENG-6846.xml and supplement ID (104) is in ENG-6747.xml
changeSet.sql:
-- First remove the incorrect associations. DELETE FROM `prodlims`.`horizondisease_horizondiseasesupplement` WHERE `supplement_id` = 104;
-- Insert the correct ones. INSERT INTO `prodlims`.`horizondisease_horizondiseasesupplement` (`supplement_id`, `template_id`, `disease_id`) VALUES (104, 144, (SELECT `id` FROM `prodlims`.`horizondisease` WHERE `cloudId` = 'FANCC')), (104, 145, (SELECT `id` FROM `prodlims`.`horizondisease` WHERE `cloudId` = 'FANCC')), (104, 146, (SELECT `id` FROM `prodlims`.`horizondisease` WHERE `cloudId` = 'FANCC')), (104, 147, (SELECT `id` FROM `prodlims`.`horizondisease` WHERE `cloudId` = 'FANCC')), (104, 148, (SELECT `id` FROM `prodlims`.`horizondisease` WHERE `cloudId` = 'FANCC'));
changeSet.rollback:
DELETE FROM `prodlims`.`horizondisease_horizondiseasesupplement` WHERE `supplement_id` = 104;
INSERT INTO `prodlims`.`horizondisease_horizondiseasesupplement` (`supplement_id`, `template_id`, `disease_id`) VALUES (104, 13, (SELECT `id` FROM `prodlims`.`horizondisease` WHERE `cloudId` = 'FANCC')), (104, 12, (SELECT `id` FROM `prodlims`.`horizondisease` WHERE `cloudId` = 'FANCC')), (104, 14, (SELECT `id` FROM `prodlims`.`horizondisease` WHERE `cloudId` = 'FANCC')), (104, 15, (SELECT `id` FROM `prodlims`.`horizondisease` WHERE `cloudId` = 'FANCC')), (104, 16, (SELECT `id` FROM `prodlims`.`horizondisease` WHERE `cloudId` = 'FANCC'));
